data.message: HAPPY NEW YEAR WITH BLOOD TEARS HOPE WISH WITHOUT NO FEAR SHADY XV EVERY NIGHT DAYS AND LIGHT TO FIGHT WITH OUR STAN RIGHT THAT U LIGHT AND GIDE ME LOUD THROUGH MY EARS FUCK BRITNEY SPEARS WELL ILL SAY FUCK IT ALL AND RISING A BEER WITH MY MIDDLE FINGER FOR CHEERS IM PENNYSHADY THAT U HEAR STANDING HERE STILL MY ONLY TRULY SHADYFAMILY THAT  I THANK AND I LOVE FROM MY STAN SOUL AND HEART And TRUST AND BELIEVE KEEP IT REAL WITH HAPPINESS AND STRENGTH  I WISH U ALL FIRST OF ALL GOOD HEALTH AND SURVIVE THROUGH THIS DARK LIVING DEATH KEEP FAITH JUST WAIT ANYTHING CAN BECOME TRUE WHEN U REALLY WANT TO ONE LOVE FROM ME PENNYSHADY SPEAKIN TRULY FROM GREECE PEACE MY LOVELY STANS <3 <3 <3 !!!
